de.gnwi.spicestographstream

Class SpicesToGraphStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.gnwi.spicestographstream.SpicesToGraphStream

  • public class SpicesToGraphStream
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to generate GraphStream objects from Spices objects.
    Author:
    Mirco Daniel, Jonas Schaub

        public void setNodeSize(org.graphstream.graph.Graph aGraph,
                        int aSize)
                 throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Sets the node size of aGraph and sets the according field in this object. Note: This will not work unless 'size-mode: dyn-size;' is specified for the nodes in the graph's stylesheet!
        Parameters:
        aGraph - whose edge weight should be altered
        aSize - to give to the graph's nodes
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if aGraph is 'null' or aSize is zero or negative

      • setFullParticleNameDisplay

        Parameters:

      • updateSpicesGraph

        public void updateSpicesGraph(org.graphstream.graph.Graph aGraph,
                              de.gnwi.spices.Spices aSpices)
                       throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Changes a GraphStream Graph object to match the given Spices object. The graph is not reinstantiated but cleared and then filled with elements and attributes according to the Spices object so that a GraphStream Viewer observing the graph does not loose connection to it. The different parts of the Spices object are all combined in one graph (but unconnected). If the Spices' error message is not 'null' the graph is only cleared. Node color, node shape, edge weight, node weight and node size are set according to the matching object fields if they have been updated.
        Parameters:
        aGraph - a GraphStream Graph that should display the Spices structure
        aSpices - a Spices object that should be displayed in the graph
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if aGraph or aSpices is 'null'

      • updateSpicesGraph

        public void updateSpicesGraph(org.graphstream.graph.Graph aGraph,
                              de.gnwi.spices.Spices aSpices,
                              int aPartNumber)
                       throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Changes a GraphStream Graph object to match the given Spices object. The graph is not reinstantiated but cleared and then filled with elements and attributes according to the Spices object so that a GraphStream Viewer observing the graph does not loose connection to it. Only the part specified by aPartNumber is displayed in the graph. If the Spices' error message is not 'null' the graph is only cleared. Node color, node shape, edge weight, node weight and node size are set according to the matching object fields if they have been updated.
        Parameters:
        aGraph - a GraphStream Graph that should display the Spices structure
        aSpices - a Spices object that should be displayed in the graph
        aPartNumber - the part of the Spices object to be displayed
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if aGraph or aSpices is 'null' or aPartNumber is invalid
